column5: My marriage counsellor suggested I have more sex with my (now ex) husband of 15 years - you know, to keep him happy. Turns out he was cheating on me for years. So gross.
I should have read this before I had a few drinks & messaged my ex last night üò¨
He was trying to be funny. I didn‚Äôt laugh...
Oh my god üòÇ
I thought I did. We were married for 15 years & he cheated on me. So I guess my answer is no... & I have no idea what true love is anymore.
This makes me so happy. I‚Äôm almost 40 and only now starting to not accept the shitty behaviour I‚Äôve accepted for far too long. Proud of you xx
Ugh. She said nothing of the sort. Please quit with the ‚Äúnot all men‚Äù BS.
This is way too familiar üòë
Recently did the same thing but think I may have taken up with another LVM without missing a beat. Why am I like this?!!
Completely agree. He is a lying coward.
Oh my god. This hurts to read. Whenever a friend wanted to spend time with he he‚Äôd say - What do they want? They only want to see you because they want something from you.

1. Leaving my alcoholic, cheating husband. 

2. Switching to a plant based diet. 

3. Taking up Lindy Hop.
You‚Äôre exactly right. Until recently I was unsure of my rights so thought because his name is on the title he can still come in.
He can‚Äôt believe it - it‚Äôs bizarre?!! What the hell did he think was going to happen. Still tells me all the time it‚Äôs my fault.

In saying that - he moved out of the house 7 months ago & has been paying rent there. I‚Äôve spoken to the local police who have explained I‚Äôm the only occupant of the property & he has no right to be here.
I‚Äôm in Australia. Will definitely look into it. Thank you!!
I can‚Äôt. We jointly own the house & have a 14 year old son together. Otherwise I would have done this immediately.
Just walks in with his key.
Way. Too. Relevant.
You are spectacular.
Yes!! You totally can. Give yourself plenty of time to heal & you‚Äôll be just fine.
Toasted Sandwiches. Sweet/Savoury. I don‚Äôt give a damn.
This response made me smile. Much love ‚ù§Ô∏è
Hope you‚Äôre ok!!
Burned incense!! He always hated it & I didn‚Äôt buy or burn any for almost 18 years. I like it!!
This is too real. Magically my libido came back after I left him.
Try hummus & garlic bread. You can thank me later üòâ
I. Want. That.
Nuts ü•ú
Go nuts ü•ú
That‚Äôs exactly how I found it!
Haha!! We both win! üòâ
She‚Äôs stunning & I understand her hair is likely perfect for the runway. I‚Äôm just here for the fake internet points.
Smart kid üòÇ
She saw her hair!
No is a complete sentence. We don‚Äôt need to justify & explain our decisions. No!
RIGHT?! THANK YOU!!
He use to tell me - you‚Äôre my best friend and all I need. VOMIT. It was because no one else wanted a bar of him! Smart people.
HE USE TO SAY THIS ABOUT SEX TOO!! Oh my god. I‚Äôd completely forgotten about that.

Saaaaame!!! So many of my closest friends have said - there was always something ‚Äúoff‚Äù about him. I wondered why they didn‚Äôt tell me before but understand it‚Äôs not really something you just casually bring up.
My nex literally has zero friends. None. I can‚Äôt believe it took me so long to figure out why.

Tried to set a boundary with my nex yesterday after he wanted to come to my house to do laundry?! NO THANKS. He is 41 years old & has not lived here for 6 months. Surely he can find somewhere else to do it. According to him I‚Äôm only saying no because it doesn‚Äôt benefit me & so I have power over him. Um. No. I said no because I don‚Äôt want your lying, cheating ass anywhere near me! Idiot.
Agreed. Wholeheartedly.
With an Australian accent.
Hahaaaaaa!! She‚Äôs local to me too!!!
My ex husband did the exact same thing. He finally admitted after a really long time that he was drinking while driving home from work every night.
My bulldog does the same thing!! She loves socks!!

My ex husband & I were in couples counselling & he expressed the desire for more sex. Things had been weird in our relationship for a while hence the need for counselling. We‚Äôd been married for 15 years. We agreed on 3 times a week & I was expected to ‚Äúperform‚Äù whether I was in the mood, sick, depressed etc. He put in NO effort at all. Turns out he had cheated on me & was having an emotional affair the entire time. BYE ASSHOLE!!
My ex still claims the split was mutual. I kicked him out for being unfaithful about 6 months ago. The disconnect is baffling. I LEFT YOU?!
People in the comments were strongly for or against. It got pretty heated!!
I thought the exact same!!
Just made lentil sloppy joes for the first time this week. We‚Äôre hooked!!
Fuck. Yes.
I like that you clarified that nothing is wrong. We were all going to ask!!

My nex said he didn‚Äôt want presents or a fuss made on his birthday so I shouldn‚Äôt either. Broke my heart every time that he couldn‚Äôt put in the smallest bit of effort to make me feel loved and appreciated. My last birthday, a week after we split I bought myself my favourite flowers & chocolates then went out for a beautiful lunch at my favourite place with a friend. He couldn‚Äôt stand it so left the droopiest, saddest bunch of gas station flowers at my house. That was a huge moment for me in realising how much better off I was without him. 
I‚Äôm so happy for you!!
This made me laugh uncontrollably. Love both of your responses. Bodily functions are embarrassing but hilarious.
I‚Äôm so so happy for you!! Onwards & upwards.
My first reaction was fear also...
Thank you!! NOT falling for it. Ew.
Oh he‚Äôs trying every trick in the book. No thanks. PASS.

From personal experience - men don‚Äôt look at our bodies the same way we do. I‚Äôve lost about 90lbs this past year so am in the same boat with the loose skin. 
I was really concerning about getting naked the first time with the man I‚Äôm currently dating but he‚Äôs really helped to me to love those bits too.

I think mostly people you meet on OLD should be understanding of the fact you‚Äôll be chatting to & meeting others. Until you‚Äôve had the ‚Äúexclusive‚Äù‚Äôdiscussion there‚Äôs absolutely nothing wrong with that.

I complete agree - definitely didn‚Äôt take his threats lightly. 
I had friends stationed outside the house ready to take him to their place incase of emergency. Thankfully it didn‚Äôt come to that.
Sal-tea.
I have to keep reminding myself of that. HIS DECISIONS. HIS ACTIONS. I will no longer be held responsible & I will create a happy life for my son & I without him.
For that particular stunt he waited until the last night but it all started before I even got on the plane.
Hahaaaaa!! Do it!
Works 60% of the time, every time.

Oh no! I didn‚Äôt get that impressed at all. Totally get it.
Oh god. So gross.
My thoughts exactly.
Uuuuugh. Revolting.

What type of life can they possibly have going forward if they take no responsibility?? I feel lucky that I know I deserve better. This behaviour seems so common & typical for cheaters.

Completely agree. The cheating is bad but this is the gift that keeps on giving!!

Yep!! Seems to be the typical cheater move.
Divorce is ‚Äúno fault‚Äù here in Australia... Thank you for your support. So much work to do to disentangle from him!
It wouldn‚Äôt be different for me. He cheated. I‚Äôm out. What would be different is my respect for him as a person.

Heck yes. Looking now. Unfortunately we still have a lot of unfinished business to work out so I can‚Äôt quite block him yet & so not tempted. He repulses me. I‚Äôm 4 months today since we offer seperated.

All my love. I‚Äôm so glad you‚Äôve found happiness. Completely agree about not seeing how bad things are - it was the same for me. Now I can leave his awful messages & move on with my day instead of him being in my face all the time.
